org.webcurator.core.targets
Class MembersRemovedEventPropagator

java.lang.Object
  org.webcurator.core.targets.MembersRemovedEventPropagator

public class MembersRemovedEventPropagator
extends java.lang.Object

The MembersRemovedEventPropagator deals with members that are removed to groups, allowing the TargetManager to (1) unschedule members as required and (2) notify owners of ancestor groups.

Author:
bbeaumont
